member.name: T:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview
member.summary: A Simple replacement for PrintPreviewControl that allows you to preview even if the user has no printers installed. View the demo on Custom Preview to see how it is used.

member.name: M:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of FlexCelPreview.

member.name: M:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.ScreenResolution
member.summary: Returns the screen resolution being used.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.ScreenScale
member.summary: This is the ScreenResoulution divided by 96. So an screen with 100% magnification (96 dpi) will have a ScreenScale of 1, while a screen with 200% magnification will have a ScreenScale of 2.

member.name: E:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.StartPageChanged
member.summary: Fires when the starting page changes.

member.name: M:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.OnStartPageChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Replace this event when creating a custom descendant of FlexCelPreview.

member.name: E:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.ZoomChanged
member.summary: Fires when the Zoom changes. (for example, the user uses ctrl+MouseWeel).

member.name: M:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.OnZoomChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Replace this event when creating a custom descendant of FlexCelPreview.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.Document
member.summary: Document to be Previewed.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.PageXSeparation
member.summary: Separation (in display units) between a page an the next. Note that if is true and the preview window is bigger than the page being displayed, this value has no effect.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.CenteredPreview
member.summary: When true, the preview will be drawn at the middle of the window, instead of at the left. If true, then is the minimum margin that the preview will have.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.PageYSeparation
member.summary: Separation (in display units) between a page an the next.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.EndPreviewAtLastPage
member.summary: When true, the preview will stop at the last page, and if you are showing more than one page at the same time you won't be able to select the last page. When false, FlexCelPreview will add enough space after the last page so all pages are selectable. Note that in normal cases this won't make a difference, this property only applies if zoom is so small that you can see more than one page in the preview.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.AutofitPreview
member.summary: Defines if the page will be automatically zoomed to fit in the preview. Note that zoom will never be less than 10% or 400%. If you want to autofit just once, call instead.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.StartPage
member.summary: Page the preview is showing.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.TotalPages
member.summary: Number of pages displaying.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.Zoom
member.summary: Zoom preview.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.CacheSize
member.summary: The cache size in number of pages stored at 100% zoom. For larger zoom actual number of pages is decreased by (Zoom*Zoom)

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.ShowThumbsPageNumber
member.summary: If true, the thumbnails will display the page number. Note that this property only affects the thumbnails, not the main preview.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.ThumbnailSmall
member.summary: When using this component on Thumbnail mode, set this property to another FlexCelPreview component that will hold the small Thumbnail images.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.ThumbnailLarge
member.summary: When using this component on Thumbnail mode, set this property to another FlexCelPreview component that will hold the large Thumbnail images.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.SmoothingMode
member.summary: This affects how the images are rendered on the screen. Some modes will look a little blurred but with better quality. Consult the .NET framework documentation on SmoothingMode for more information

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.InterpolationMode
member.summary: This affects how the images are rendered on the screen. Some modes will look a little blurred but with better quality. Consult the .NET framework documentation on SmoothingMode for more information

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.AutoScroll
member.summary: Indicates whether scrollbars appear automatically when needed.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.BackColor
member.summary: Background color for the preview.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.PageShadowSize
member.summary: Shadow size for the pages in the preview. Set it to 0 to disable shadows.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.PageShadowColor
member.summary: Shadow color for the pages in the preview.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.PageBorderColor
member.summary: Border color for the pages in the preview.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.PageBorderWidth
member.summary: Border width for the pages in the preview.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.PageBorderStyle
member.summary: Border style for the pages in the preview.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.PageNumberBgColor
member.summary: Background color for the page numbers in the thumbnail view.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.PageNumberSelectedBgColor
member.summary: Background color for the selected page number in the thumbnail view.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.PageNumberTextColor
member.summary: Text color for the page number in the thumbnail view.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.PageNumberSelectedTextColor
member.summary: Text color for the selected page number in the thumbnail view.

member.name: M:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.InvalidatePreview
member.summary: Invalidates the preview and forces the control to reload from the document. When the control is a Thumbnail you cannot Invalidate it, this will be done automatically when you invalidate the main view.

member.name: P:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.MaxPageSize
member.summary: Returns the maximum height and width of a page. Note that width and height might not be from the same page, this is the width of the widest page and the height of the tallest page.

member.name: M:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.AutofitPreviewOnce(FlexCel.Winforms.TAutofitPreview)
member.summary: Use this method to do a single autofit. If you want the preview to be in "autofit mode" so it keeps autofitting even if you resize the window, set instead.

member.name: M:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the standard mousedown event to handle it.

member.name: M:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.ProcessCmdKey(System.Windows.Forms.Message@,System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Overrides the ProcessCmdKey event.

member.name: M:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the OnfontChanged event.

member.name: M:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.OnResize(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides de OnResize method.

member.name: M:FlexCel.Winforms.FlexCelPreview.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the OnPaint event.

member.name: T:FlexCel.Winforms.TAutofitPreview
member.summary: How the preview will be zoomed.

member.name: F:FlexCel.Winforms.TAutofitPreview.None
member.summary: No autofit. The value in Zoom is used.

member.name: F:FlexCel.Winforms.TAutofitPreview.Width
member.summary: Fit to the width of the biggest page in the preview, so it displays without horizontal scroll bars.

member.name: F:FlexCel.Winforms.TAutofitPreview.Height
member.summary: Fit to the height of the biggest page in the preview.

member.name: F:FlexCel.Winforms.TAutofitPreview.Full
member.summary: Fit so the biggest page in the preview can be seen at full without scrolling.
